altTitles.en: A Story About Confessing to an Elf

altTitles.ja: 近所のエルフお姉ちゃんに告白した

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinjo no Elf Onee-chan ni Kokuhaku shita

altTitles.en: I Confessed to the Elven Girl Next Door

altTitles.ja: 陰キャエルフちゃんに告った

altTitles.en: I Confessed to the Gloomy Elf

altTitles.vi: Tỏ tình với chị gái elf
Tỏ tình với cô elf u ám

altTitles.ro: O Poveste Despre Declarația De Dragoste Pentru Elfi

altTitles.ja: 機動絶記ガンダム SEQUEL

description.en: It has been 700 years since a certain "war" in which more than half of the human race lost their lives. The Gundam, which had protected the Earth during the Great War, was no longer necessary for humankind. In such a peaceful world, there was a woman called "Bloody Kaoris". This is a story of betrayal over the lost "God" named "Gundam".

altTitles.ja: 戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ

description.en:
The children swear revenge in the midst of war.

The official comic version of the dramatic simulation RPG “Battlefield Fuga” with the theme of “War x Revenge x Beasts” “Battlefield” 'Fuga Melody of Steel'! The manga was written by Takafumi Adachi (representative works: "DM Fighter Homura'' and "Metal Fight Beyblade,'' etc.).

＜Synopsis＞
A world made up of floating islands of various sizes - a floating continent, where two types of races, "inuhito" and "nekohito" live.
Marto, an Inuhito boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei while herding sheep in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, the village is suddenly attacked by the northeastern country ``Berman Empire,'' and it burns to the ground overnight. How could something like this happen... Marto and the others were confused, and a mysterious voice came from the radio...! ?

Children caught up in the war board the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' to retrieve their abducted families!

As an appendix exclusive to the book, it also includes setting drawings by Takafumi Adachi and a development blog by Hiroshi Matsuyama, general director of the game software ``Fuga of Battlefield'' and CEO of Cyber ​​Connect Two Co., Ltd.
description.ja:
子どもたちは戦火の中、復讐を誓うー

“戦争×復讐×ケモノ”をテーマにしたドラマティックシュミレーションRPG『戦場のフーガ』の公式コミカライズ作品『戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ』！漫画執筆は足立たかふみ氏（代表作：『D・Mファイター焔』や『メタルファイト ベイブレード』など）が担当。

＜あらすじ＞
「イヌヒト」と「ネコヒト」という2種類の種族が暮らす、大小様々な浮島からなる世界――浮遊大陸。
イヌヒトの少年マルトは、辺境にあるプチ・モナ村でヒツウシ飼いをしながら妹のメイと穏やかに暮らしていた。ある日突然、北東の国「ベルマン帝国」から村が襲撃され、一夜にして戦火に焼け落ちる。どうしてこんなことに……混乱するマルトたちにラジオから謎の声が―――！？

戦火に巻き込まれたこどもたちは連れ去られた家族を取り戻すため、謎の巨大戦車『タラニス』に乗り込む！

単行本だけの付録として足立たかふみ氏の設定画やゲームソフト『戦場のフーガ』総監督であり株式会社サイバーコネクトツー代表取締役 松山洋による開発ブログも収録。

altTitles.en: I Became a Legendary Archmage by Reading a Book

altTitles.pt-br: Me Tornei uma Arquimaga Lendária ao Ler um Livro

description.en:
I was reincarnated as a grimoire containing all the magical knowledge of another world.

Anyone who reads me can become a legendary archmage.

Please, just read me...
But no one is willing to open my pages.

The unemployed Chiaki is the eldest of three brothers.  
With no parents, he starts job hunting to support his two younger brothers.  
Chiaki witnesses a young woman being sexually assaulted and tries to help, 
without knowing that this behavior would change his destiny.  


---
description.ru: Безработный молодой человек Чиаки является старшим братом в семье. Будучи без родителей, он начал поиски работы, чтобы поддержать двух младших братьев.И вот однажды, наконец, добившись финального собеседования, Чиаки стал свидетелем извращенца. Невольно попытавшись помочь, он даже не догадывался, что подобное поведение изменит его судьбу.
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um jovem desempregado, e o irmão mais velho dentre os 3 irmãos, sem pais, ele começou a procurar emprego para ajudar a sustentar seus dois irmãos mais novos. Um dia, quando finalmente consegue uma entrevista, Chiaki avista um pervertido e involuntariamente tenta ajudar sem saber que essa ação mudaria o seu destino drasticamente.

altTitles.vi: Ảo ảnh thiên đường

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

description.en:
Tomosato Ogino, a brilliant doctor, loses his life in an earthquake while operating on his younger sister. However, he finds himself reincarnated in another world and given the vocation of an "assassin" who specializes in the ability to kill people. As he struggles with the fact that he has lost his sister and his vocation, a girl who looks exactly like his sister appears in front of him...? 

In this otherworldly fantasy suspense, a former doctor who makes his living as a "revenger" gets involved in various incidents.

title.en: EroManga-Sensei: Yamada Elf-daisensei no Koi suru Junshin Gohan

altTitles.ru: Эроманга-сенсей: Ямада Эльф делает простые блюда с любовью

altTitles.ja: エロマンガ先生 山田エルフ大先生の恋する純真ごはん

altTitles.en: EroManga-Sensei: I'll Seduce You With Food

description.en:
A "Eromanga-sensei" spinoff centered around the beautiful and famous young light novel author Yamada Elf. After failed attempts at seducing her dense siscon neighbour Izumi Masamune, she tries it with cooking.  


---
description.ru: Спин-офф о том, как Ямада Эльф готовит вкусные блюда в попытке завоевать сердце Изуми Масамуне.

title.en: Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Suru

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生、乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生する

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou ni Tenseisuru

altTitles.en: A High School Boy Reincarnates as the Villainous Daughter in an Otome Game

description.en:
One day, "I," an ordinary high school boy living in the present day, was hit by a truck and reincarnated in another world. But what a surprise it was to find out that I was reincarnated as Elena Evan, the "villainess" of an otome game!

If this continues, the future that awaits me will either be condemnation, execution, or exile... I want to avoid that at all costs. While I was worrying about this, I found a glimmer of hope. If Tiara, the main heroine, and I could get together and find a yuri route for us, maybe we could avoid a bad ending...?

However, I am now beset by a number of beautiful and handsome men...?
description.ja:
現代に生きるごく普通の男子高校生である「俺」は、ある日トラックに轢かれて異世界に転生してしまう。しかし、転生した先はなんと乙女ゲームの「悪役令嬢」エレナ・エヴァンだった――！

このままだと待つ未来は、断罪・死刑・国外追放……。それだけはなんとしても阻止したい。悩んだ俺はひとつの光を見出す。正ヒロインのティアラと俺が結ばれて百合ルートになれば、バッドエンドを回避できるんじゃないか…!?

しかし、そんな俺の前に立ちはだかるのは見目麗しい数々のイケメンたちで――!?

description.en: What happens when the greatest martial artist of the Murim world meets a genius magician from a fantasy world?
description.fr:
Que se passe-t-il quand le plus grand artiste martial du monde du Murim rencontre une magicienne de génie d'un monde fantastique ?  
  
**Links:**  
- [Naver blog de l'auteur](https://blog.naver.com/tdstudio)  
- [Webtoon Original ](http://page.kakao.com/home/48455145) (Raw) (KakaoPage)

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

title.en: After Improperly Licking a Dog, I Became a Billionaire

altTitles.zh: 不当舔狗后，我成了亿万神豪

altTitles.en: From Simp to Billionaire: The Rise of a Divine Tycoon

altTitles.zh-ro: Bùdāng Tiǎn Gǒu Hòu, Wǒ Chéngle Yì Wàn Shén Háo

altTitles.vi: Bỏ làm simp chúa, ta có trong tay cả tỉ thần hào

altTitles.es: ¡Me Cansé de Ser un Rastrero y Ahora Soy Multimillonario!

altTitles.pt-br: Após eu ter deixado de ser um puxa saco virei um trilionário

description.en: Once a typical simp, Lin Xin’s life takes a drastic turn when he’s dumped and inherits a divine financial system—starting him off with a whopping trillion yuan! But there’s a twist: he can only spend this fortune on women. Stuck with this bizarre stipulation, Lin Xin is forced to navigate an unconventional and thrilling path to wealth and power, transforming from a mere simp to a legendary tycoon.
description.zh: 林新本是一条普通舔狗，被甩后获得神豪系统，开局获得亿万亿！蛋疼的是，这个钱只能花在女生身上！没办法，为了花完这些钱，林新开启了一条不同寻常的神豪逆袭之路！
description.pt-br: Depois de ser dispensado, ele ganhou o sistema Shen Hao com trilhões em dinheiro depositados! O ruim é que esse dinheiro só pode ser gasto com mulheres! Agora, ele vai embarcar em um caminho de contra-ataques para receber seus upgrades e cashbacks.

description.en:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  
After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom...   
Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. all visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes...  
A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
description.ja: 『異世界居酒屋「のぶ」』の作者・蝉川夏哉による原作書き下ろしのスピンオフ作品。次なる世界は異世界・東王国、王都パリシィア!王都パリシィアでも、異世界の住人たちは、初めて見る日本の居酒屋料理に戸惑いながらも舌鼓を打ち……。

altTitles.vi: Âm Dương Sư Nue

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

altTitles.ja: 海が走るエンドロール

description.en:
After turning 65 and bereaved of her husband, Umiko visits a cinema for the first time in decades. A shocking, life-changing event awaits her. When she meets Kai, an art student majoring in film, Umiko realises that she wants to make a film. She realises that she is on the side of "the people who want to make films"...
Lured by the waves that stir her heart, the 65-year-old dives into the sea of film!
description.ja:
65歳を過ぎ夫と死別し、数十年ぶりに映画館を訪れたうみ子。そこには、人生を変える衝撃的な出来事が待っていた。海(カイ)という映像専攻の美大生に出会い、うみ子は気づく。自分は「映画が撮りたい側」の人間なのだと……。
心を騒ぎ立てる波に誘われ、65歳、映画の海へとダイブする!!

title.en: The Jet Black Hedgehog: Shadow the Hedgehog

altTitles.ja: 漆黒のハリネズミ シャドウ・ザ・ヘッジホッグ

altTitles.ja-ro: Shikkoku no Harinezumi Shadow the Hedgehog

description.en:
The meaning of his birth. The answer he leads to is—

A new serialization of a full-speed action franchise that has attracted the world's attention!

An adaptation of the much-talked-about *Sonic x Shadow Generations*! CoroCoro's No.1 antihero has arrived.

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới sau ngày Diệt Vong

description.en:
Faced with imminent defeat and certain death, would you choose to run – or continue to fight for a doomed world?

When mysterious towers appear across the world, summoning monsters that prey on mankind, this is the choice presented to the Tower Walkers – adventurers with special powers to fight the monsters.

On the brink of death, they can choose to use a “regression stone” to return to the past for a second chance, though this decision places them in a separate timeline forever.

Stubborn Tower Walker Jaehwan rejects this choice, choosing to fight for the original timeline, and learning shocking secrets about the Tower along the way.
description.ko:
<전지적 독자 시점> 싱숑 작가 원작.

이것은 모두가 과거로 돌아갈 때 마지막까지 회귀하지 않았던 한 사나이의 이야기다.
description.pt-br: Esta é a história de um homem que não voltou quando todos retornaram ao passado. Os humanos foram convocados de repente para se tornarem “Andarilhos” e precisavam limpar a torre para salvar o mundo… 77º Andar: A Pedra do Retorno foi descoberta. Andarilhos podiam agora retornar ao passado. Lentamente, todos foram embora… A última esperança da humanidade, “Carpe Diem”, foi formada com as pessoas que se recusaram a abandonar o mundo… O último Andarilho chegou ao 100º andar. Ele não sabia mais no que crer. Obs.: Essa é a adaptação da novel que existe dentro da novel/manhwa Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint e que o protagonista lê em sua juventude.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.es-la: Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

title.en: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.en: The Blue Flowers, and the Ceramic Forest

altTitles.th: แต่งเติมลวดลายในรัก

description.en:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics…  
  
This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.
description.zh: 青之花 器之森漫画 ，小玉ユキ为大人献上的爱情故事， 陶瓷器与充满坡道的小镇、波佐见—— 对「器」怀着热爱的男女、 在这个小镇相遇…！？

description.en:
"Did I take away their lover?"

Seo Ino, an average man from South Korea, wakes up after losing consciousness to find himself in a strange place. He soon comes to the realization that he is inside the body of Cassius, the Vice Captain of the Royal Knights. The only person he can rely on is Cassius's fellow knight and former lover, Alberto Noe, who has always protected Cassius. But knowing that Alberto is all he has now, Cassius (Ino) makes a vow to protect him instead.

altTitles.vi: Sự trả thù của Masamune-kun

altTitles.ja: 政宗くんのリベンジ after school

altTitles.zh: 政宗君的复仇 after school

description.en: Makabe Masamune has changed himself greatly for a single reason: he wants revenge. Contrary to his past, he has worked hard to become good-looking in order to carry out this goal. Faster than anticipated, he even meets the target of his revenge the first day after transferring in.. Adagaki Aki! He wastes no time beginning his plan, but revenge doesn't come easily.
description.ru: Макабэ Масамунэ прошёл через боль, связанную с девушкой — Адагаки Аки. Все это время он усиленно тренировался, чтобы отомстить ей. Ради своей цели он отбросил своё прошлое и начал заниматься собой, чтобы стать первоклассным красавчиком. Переведясь в новую школу, он сразу же встретил свою первую мишень для мести — ту самую девушку, Адагаки Аки. Он решает не тянуть со своим планом, ведь месть сама собой не свершится.

title.en: The Story of a Girl Who's My Best Friend, She's Acting Strange Lately

altTitles.ja: 親友の女の子の様子が最近おかしい話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinyuu no Onnanoko no Yousu ga Saikin Okashii Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of My Best Friend, a Girl Who's Acting Oddly These Days
The Story of a Best Friend, Who is a Girl Acts Odd Nowadays

description.en: My best friend is a girl I have known since elementary school.  She was like a boy, but nowadays she acts odd. We were like two guys, but now... she tries to increase the skinship and gets upset when I speak to girls.

altTitles.vi: Tác giả đào hoa

altTitles.th: น้องสาวของผมคืออาจารย์เอโรมังกะ

description.en:
Writing light novels isn't all that easy, especially when you're in high school and you have to do the cooking and the chores for your shut-in stepsister who's hardly come out of her room the past year! In the light novel business, it's crucial to have the right person illustrating your books to help them sell–and maybe get made into manga and anime! But in a world of online pen names, the author and the illustrator may still not even know each other . . . until one day they realize they've been living in the same house all along! Now the home life of confident writer Masamune Izumi and his reclusive sister Sagiri–aka the artist ''Eromanga Sensei''–will be a drama to compare with their rising careers, their restive fan base, and their rivals in the industry!  


---
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18142)
description.ru: История вращается вокруг Масамунэ Изуми, ученика вуза и, по совместительству, автора лайт-новел. У Масамунэ есть сестра по имени Сагири, та ещё хикикомори, которая не выходила из своей комнаты в течение целого года. Она даже заставляет своего брата, готовить и приносить ей еду, топая ногой по полу. Поэтому Масамунэ хочет, чтобы его сестра вышла из комнаты, ведь они — семья как-никак.

altTitles.vi: 1/2 Hoàng Tử

description.en: It is the year 2100 A.D., and humans have developed a virtual reality game with a realism level of 99%. Feng Lan, due to a bet with her twin brother, vows to succeed in playing the game without using her "female benefits." Due to this, she becomes the first and only female to play as a male character in "Second Life." As her infamy rises as a bloodthirsty warrior, can she keep her identity a secret from her real life acquaintances whom she has beaten up?

altTitles.vi: Đảo Hải Tặc
Vua Hải Tặc

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Assassin, Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei Suru

altTitles.fr: Le meilleur assassin, réincarné en un aristocrate dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai Saikou no Ansatsusha, Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei suru

altTitles.en: The World's Finest Assassin Gets Reincarnated in Another World

altTitles.ru: Лучший в мире ассасин, переродившийся в другом мире как аристократ

altTitles.ja: 世界最高の暗殺者、異世界貴族に転生する

altTitles.zh: 世界頂尖的暗殺者轉生為異世界貴族

altTitles.vi: Sát Thủ Đệ Nhất Thế Giới Chuyển Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: The most dangerous prey... When the most accomplished assassin on Earth meets his end just before retirement, he finds himself standing before a goddess. Her world is headed for disaster, and she has need of his particular set of skills. Armed with powerful new abilities and decades of deadly knowledge, he begins his second life as Lugh, young scion of the Tuatha Dé clan of assassins. His mission: to find and eliminate the strongest individual in this world—the hero!
description.ja: 世界一の暗殺者が異世界に転生。そこで請け負ったミッションは【人類に厄災をもたらすと予言された《勇者》を殺すこと】。前世の暗殺スキルと異世界の魔法を組み合わせ、彼は史上最強の暗殺者へと成長していく――。
description.ru:
Великолепный убийца, решил уйти в отставку, по случаю своей старости. Но его познания в темных делах и стратегические навыки ведения убийств не давали покоя влиятельным лицам. И потому случаю они "заказали" старика.   
В результате тот погиб, весь в мыслях о "жизни по ту сторону".   
Но это только начало его дальнейшей судьбы, ведь его талант приглянулся настоящей богине!   
И теперь ассасин получит новое тело, ну и главное задание его жизни - убить героя…

altTitles.ja: ファイナルファンタジー　ロスト・ストレンジャー

description.en:
The manga follows a Square Enix's employee who get hit by a truck along with his sister and both of them are transported into the world of Final Fantasy.  
  
Final Fantasy: Lost Stranger was released as part of the Final Fantasy franchise's 30th anniversary project.

altTitles.ja: 見えてますよ！　愛沢さん

description.en:
Michi, plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts, pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami, ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus, hanging around school from some lingering attachment.

Still, no matter what ghost it is, Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart, her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)
description.id:
Michi, diganggu selamanya oleh kemampuannya untuk melihat hantu, berpura-pura seperti dia tidak bisa melihat mereka untuk menghindari mereka bagaimanaoun itu.

Tapi baru-baru ini dia menemukan hantu yang tidak bisa dia abaikan:
Aizawa Honami, mantan teman sekelas dan mantan anggota grup idola terkenal De:LPhinus, berkeliaran di sekolah karena keterikatan yang masih melekat.

Tetap saja, tidak peduli hantu apa itu, Michi tidak terlibat.
Meskipun saat dia menguatkan hatinya, matanya terus kembali ke kejenakaan aneh dan fanservice Honami yang penuh gairah...(?)
description.ja:
昔から幽霊が見えることに悩まされていたみちは、なるべく関わらないよう見えないフリを続けていた。

しかし、そんな彼女でも無視できない幽霊が最近出てきた。それは大人気アイドルグループ「De:LPhinus」の元メンバー、愛沢ほなみ。クラスメイトでもあった彼女は、未練から教室に出るようになったのだ。

相手が誰であれ、幽霊である以上関わらない。そう決意するみちではあるが、ほなみの幼稚で破天荒な行動と熱烈なファンサービス（？）に気付けば目で追っていて……。
description.es-la:
Michi, maldecida para siempre con la capacidad de ver fantasmas, finge que no puede verlos precisamente porque quiere evitarlos a toda costa.

Pero recientemente se encontró con un fantasma que no puede ignorar: Aizawa Honami, excompañera de clase y ex miembro del famoso grupo de Idols "De:LPhinus", quien también era compañera de clase, comenzó a aparecer en el salón de clases por algún motivo.

Aun así, no importa qué fantasmas sean, Michi no quiere involucrarse. Mientras protege su corazón, sus ojos continúan observando las payasadas y el fanservice (?) de Honami.
description.pt-br:
Michi, amaldiçoada para sempre pela habilidade de enxergar fantasmas, finge que não pode vê-los justamente porque quer evitá-los a todo custo.

Mas recentemente ela encontrou um fantasma que não pode ignorar:
Aizawa Honami, ex-colega de classe e ex-membro do famoso grupo de idols De:LPhinus, fica perambulando em torno da escola com ainda algum tipo de vínculo.

Ainda assim, não importa o que fantasmas são, Michi não quer se envolver.
Enquanto ela blinda seu coração, seus olhos continuam a observar as travessuras e fanservide de Honami.

title.en: H.P. Lovecraft's At the Mountains of Madness

altTitles.ja: 狂気の山脈にて ラヴクラフト傑作集

description.en:
Manga adaption of H. P. Lovecraft's "At the Mountains of Madness"  
  
- Won the Prix Asie de la Critique ACBD 2019 award.

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

title.en: Reincarnated as the Lazy and Villainous Noble, I Broke the Scenario and Became the Most Formidable With Extraordinary Magic

altTitles.ja: 怠惰な悪辱貴族に転生した俺、シナリオをぶっ壊したら規格外の魔力で最凶になった

altTitles.ja-ro: Taidana Akuhazukashime Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowashitara Kikaku Gai No Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta

altTitles.vi: chuyển sinh thành quý tộc phản diện và lười biếng, tôi trở thành kẻ mạnh nhất học viện

altTitles.uk: Я перевтілився у Дворянина-Лиходія, проте змінив сценарій і став найбільш грізним магом

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the villainous noble Weiss from my favorite academy game, and the fate that awaits me is nothing but the worst possible ruin, with no salvation.

I absolutely have to avoid that at all costs!

Then the only way out is to gain overwhelming power that even surpasses the game's protagonist and become the strongest!
description.ja:
大好きな学園ゲームに登場する悪役貴族・ヴァイスに転生してしまった、やがてこの身に待ち受けるのは、救いなしの最悪な破滅エンド。

それだけはなんとしてでも回避したい！

だったらこのゲームの主人公すら遠く及ばない、圧倒的な力を身につけて最強になるしかない！

最凶成り上がり異世界学園ファンタジーコミカライズ!
description.vi: Tôi đã tái sinh vào vai một quý tộc phản diện tên Weiss trong game học viện mà tôi thích nhất, và số phận chờ đợi tôi chẳng khác nào thảm họa tồi tệ nhất, không có lối thoát. Tôi nhất định phải tránh điều đó bằng mọi giá! Vậy nên cách duy nhất là có được sức mạnh áp đảo, thậm chí còn vượt xa cả nhân vật chính trong game và trở thành kẻ mạnh nhất!
description.pt-br:
Eu reencarnei como *Weiss*, o nobre que é um vilãozinho secundário do meu jogo favorito, e que está destinado a  própria ruína e morte.

Eu definitivamente preciso evitar isso de qualquer jeito!

Então, o que me sobra é conseguir um poder tão apelão que nem mesmo o protagonista ousará me enfrentar.

altTitles.vi: Samurai Kiếm Tre

description.en:
Early one New Year's morning, the rounin Senou Souichirou appears in Edo's Katagi tenements.  
  
Initially, the inhabitants regard him with fear and suspicion: Kankichi, the carpenter's son, thinks he may not be human; the neighborhood cats remark that he reeks of blood. But soon Souichirou pawns his sword, and, with a bamboo replica at his waist, settles down to a quiet life as the neighborhood school-teacher.  
  
Months pass, and all appears to be well. But trouble will not leave the Katagi tenements alone …  
  
---
- **Won the 15th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2011**

title.en: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高峰のギルドリーダー～ギルド最弱の僕だけど、ギルメン全員の愛が重くてギルドをやめられません～

altTitles.en: Another World's Highest Guild Leader: I'm the Weakest in the Guild, But I Can't Quit the Guild Because of the Heavy Love of All the Guild Members

description.en: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――
description.ja:
愛の重さも最高峰!?

異世界に転生した少年・クロウは、気まぐれでギルド「悪魔の凱旋（ルビ：ナイトメア）」を立ち上げる。気付けば「悪魔の凱旋（ルビ：ナイトメア）」は強者揃いの最高峰ギルドになっていた。ギルドメンバーは、クロウ以外全員イケメンと美少女。しかもクロウはギルド内で最弱……もうこのギルドやめていいですか？

description.en: I, Momoa, am a 15-year-old girl left alone in the world. After losing my parents in an accident, I started working as a maid for the super-wealthy Kaizaki family. But for some reason, the Kaizaki heir Akira-san is a total meanie to me! What’s more, it was revealed I am the new heir of the Kaizaki family!? A tsundere elite prince x air-headed commoner girl’s heart-throbbing love comedy!

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.pl: Opowieść o Tym, Jak Piękna Uczennica Zza Granicy Mieszkająca Po Sąsziedzku Zaczęła Odwiedzać Mnie W Domu, Po Tym Jak Pomogłem Zagubionej Małej Dziewczynce

altTitles.pt-br: A História de como Uma Linda Estudante Estrangeira que Mora ao Lado Começou a Visitar Minha Casa Depois que Ajudei Uma Menininha Perdida

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

title.en: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.

altTitles.vi: Saiki Kusuo: Kẻ siêu năng khốn khổ

altTitles.en: The Disaster Of PSI Saiki Kusuo

description.en: Kusuo Saiki is a sixteen-year-old high school student with innate supernatural powers. What are his hassles and troubles triggered by his extraordinary ability? And what misfortunes fall upon him?
description.pt:
: ||Saiki Kusuo é um estudante de 16 anos de idade com poderes sobrenaturais inatos. Quais são seus aborrecimentos e problamas desencadeados pela sua ablilidade extraordiária? E quais infortúnios cairão sobre ele?||

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.vi: Siêu nhân X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...
description.es-la: Azuma Higashi es un chico bastante popular. Aunque puede ser algo pequeño, tiene fuertes habilidades de lucha y sus calificaciones son las mejores de su clase. Esto es lo opuesto a Tokio Kurohara, su amigo que no escucha en clase y es simplemente un espectador mientras Azuma pelea. No obstante, el vínculo de estos dos amigos de la infancia es fuerte, sin importar cuán diferentes sean. Los dos viven en la prefectura de Yamato, un distrito increíblemente ordinario con algunas áreas destruidas por Choujin. Los choujin son humanos con poderes sobrenaturales y peligrosos, a menudo la causa de la destrucción circundante. Mientras regresaban a casa, Tokio y Azuma se encuentran con un Choujin, que amenaza con matarlos. Sin posibilidad de escapar, Tokio y Azuma toman una decisión crucial: convertirse en Choujin. Con estos nuevos poderes adquiridos, Tokio ya no puede ser el espectador que alguna vez fue, ahora atrapado en un mundo donde la lucha es inevitable.

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật Webtoon  Na Kang Lim

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
description.vi: Na Kang Lim, nam sinh trung học bình trường rất thích đọc webtoon. Một ngày, đã có chuyện bất ngờ xảy ra, nữ chính từ bộ webtoon cậu hay đọc đã xuất hiện ngoài đợi thật. Những sự cố trong webtoon khiến cô ấy rơi vào khủng hoảng, nhưng nhân vật chính lại không có ở đây để giải cứu nữ chính! Và Kang Lim đã trở thành nhân vật chính cùng với kí ước từ bộ truyện và khả năng du hành thời gian để cứu nữ chính

description.en:
It was 1999, the year Nostradamus predicted the end of the human race.

Riding the unprecedented occult boom, Inubosaki, an editor of a third-rate occult magazine, is covering strange incidents with his cameraman Asama, who is also psychic. As Asama's psychic powers draw them together, the two encounter a number of terrifying and bizarre phenomena. Meanwhile, in the present day, 2023, an elderly Asama is visited by someone claiming to be Inubosaki's nephew.
description.ja: 1999年、それはノストラダムスが人類滅亡を予言した年。空前のオカルトブームにのり、三流オカルト雑誌の編集者・犬吠埼はカメラマンで霊感のある浅間を伴って奇妙な事件ばかりを取材していた。浅間の霊感に引き寄せられるように二人は恐ろしい怪奇現象に遭遇していくが……。一方、2023年の現代では年老いた浅間のもとに犬吠埼の事を調べる人物が訪れる。

description.en:
The story is about Miyagawa Shota, who just graduated from high school,
and left his hometown to work in the famous Tsurumoku Furniture factory
outside of Tokyo. In the company dorm, Shota is roomed with Tabatake,
the most senior resident of the dorm and the most obnoxious roommate,
and Sugimoto, the in-house Casanova. With these two roommates, Shota
is constantly caught in awkward situations. Although the manga addresses
the issues of making career and love quite seriously, it still succeeds in
remaining funny at the same time.
A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
description.ja: 「学園の王子様」なヒロインを巡って少年少女がせめぎ合う一触即発ラブコメディ

altTitles.vi: Mùa hè dài ngày 31 tháng 8

description.en:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition....

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10613/episode/353159)
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

title.en: A Manga about a Beautiful Girl

altTitles.ja: 美少女まんが描きました

altTitles.vi: Manga về cô bạn xinh đẹp

description.en: A series of short comics by Mattaku Moosuke (@mmousuke on Twitter) about the cutest girl in class, Inuta-san, and the boy sitting next to her, Inukai-kun.

Kyoko (21) and Jiro (23) live together in Tokyo without being married. 
She is a graphist in an advertisement agency, he's starting to be an illustrator. 
We follow them through their love struggles and daily life with friends and family 
in a world where sexual revolution is about to start.

Nhân Vật Phản Diện Đại Sư Huynh, Tất Cả Các Sư Muội Đều Là Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en:
My vision and my heart were completely taken over by "N."

The case of five missing junior high school boys. The massacre of an entire elementary school class. A car crash resulting in the deaths of two people. The letter "N" was left at each of these crime scenes.

An urban legend circulates, suggesting the main culprit is 'N,' a religious group thought to have collapsed 2,000 years ago.

What exactly is "N"?
